title: Is it allowed to touch the cover of the Quran without wudu in order to move it? Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: Powell says is it allowed to touch the cover of the Koran or the cover of a book with Allah's name written in Arabic without Waddell in order to move it from example from your school back to a bookcase yes there's no problem in that you're not reciting it so just moving it from the cover and putting it on the bookshelf or whatever this is permissible
